FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Mining 2: Sunterranean Mine
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Dig down into the planet's surface in search of those really valuable materials. Don't forget to build supports! +.5 base mining production. -5% logging production.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Mining 3: Mining Equipment Depot
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: Build a place to store and maintain big ugly machines that chew through rock like it's cardboard. +20% mining production. 550 silver per tax period upkeep.

FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.label: Mining 4: Asteroid Magnet
FactionColonies.BuildingFCDef.desc: People may not like it, but it's hard to deny the amount of resources gathered when you just pull the metals you want out of the sky. +20% mining production. -.5 happiness per day. +.5 unrest per day.
